codemapper 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

Build named list of clinical code look up and mapping tables

Source: R/lookups_and_mappings.R
build_all_lkps_maps.Rd

Downloads the lookup and mapping tables from UK Biobank resource 592 as well as the NHSBSA BNF-SNOMED mapping table (available here) and OPCS4, self-reported medical conditions/medications/operations from the UK Biobank codings file (available here).

build_all_lkps_maps(
  all_lkps_maps = read_all_lkps_maps(),
  ukb_codings = ukbwranglr::get_ukb_codings_direct(),
  bnf_dmd = get_nhsbsa_snomed_bnf(),
  self_report_med_to_atc_map = get_ukb_self_report_med_to_atc_map(),
  ctv3sctmap2 = NULL,
  phecode_1_2_lkp = NULL,
  icd10_phecode_1_2 = NULL,
  icd9_phecode_1_2 = NULL
)

Arguments

all_lkps_maps

UK Biobank resource 592, as returned by get_ukb_all_lkps_maps.

ukb_codings

The UK Biobank codings file, as returned by get_ukb_codings_direct.

bnf_dmd

Optional: a data frame, the NHSBSA BNF-SNOMED mapping table as returned by get_nhsbsa_snomed_bnf.

self_report_med_to_atc_map

Optional: a data frame (see get_ukb_self_report_med_to_atc_map()).

ctv3sctmap2

Optional: path to the NHS TRUD mapping file for Read 3 to SNOMEDCT ("ctv3sctmap2_uk_20200401000001.txt").

phecode_1_2_lkp

Optional: path to the phecode v1.2 lookup file ("phecode_definitions1.2.csv.zip").

icd10_phecode_1_2

Optional: path to the phecode v1.2 to ICD10 mapping file ("Phecode_map_v1_2_icd10_beta.csv.zip").

icd9_phecode_1_2

Optional: path to the phecode v1.2 to ICD10 mapping file ("phecode_icd9_map_unrolled.csv.zip").

Value

Returns a named list of data frames.

See also

all_lkps_maps_to_db()
